name: Apex Tree Select
author: Mohammad Al-Quraan
summary: A full-featured APEX region plug-in for hierarchical tree selection with tri-state checkboxes, search, and toolbar controls.
description: Apex Tree Select is a modern, standalone Oracle APEX region plug-in built for hierarchical selection using tri-state checkboxes. It supports client and server search, APEX Dynamic Actions, toolbar buttons (expand/collapse, check/uncheck, search), and integration with Universal Theme. Data sources include SQL Table, SQL Query, and Static JSON. It is optimized for APEX 21+ and has no external dependencies.
features: Client + Server search with wildcards (% and _)
Multiple data sources (SQL Table, SQL Query, Static JSON)
Support for disabled nodes and icons per node
